casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Titus Germaine WILLIAMS No. 118P09-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of NC J. Clark Fisher, Attorney at Law, for Williams, Titus Germaine Titus G. Williams

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by on the 4th of December 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, New Hanover County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."

Ervin, J., recused
